title: The best one yet!!!
body:
Im proud of this one, i always screenshot the really stupid ones but this has to take the cake.

Firstly the main reason i was killed is because thresh hooked me and then Lissandra ulted me.  
Then after that i had all 5 of them unleash everything they had at me including their ultimates (they obviously wanted that kill), yet for some obscure reason a single brave purple caster minion leapt into combat and managed to do more damage than any of them except thresh whose only damage was to come near me with sunfires cape and yasuo who managed to ult me without any knock up to see. between them doing a total of 547 damage to me which takes away my 2128 HP in 1.05 seconds.

But this turned out to be a blessing in disguise, because they all hit me with everything they had and so i had the unique chance to see exactly where all the damage in their team lay. 

So what i strategically came to conclude from this is that if i build a banshees veil it will give me the nessacary magic resist to counter the 2% magic damage dealt by thresh, while also blocking yasuo's ultimate (the only ability used on me that had any effect) (remember i didnt get knocked up by anything, so the veil should still be up when his ult hits) then because yasuo's armour shredding ultimate will be blocked, i can afford to get a bit of armour to counteract the 2% physical damage done by the purple caster minion, then bam! put all the rest of my money in damage and easy win.

i did exactly that, but for some reason it didn't work and i have no idea why :( the stats said it should have so why didnt it? i have no way of knowing where i went wrong, i feel robbed.

replies.body:
Basic arithmetic suggests that you haven't accounted for 100% of the damage. There are also a few gaps in your reasoning:
- Veil is only going to stop the first ability. So, it will only stop Yasuo's ult if it has prevented his Q from landing, and if you don't get knocked up by other means.
- This also means that the ability it would have prevented was Thresh's hook, not anything else.
- You might get Armor/MR, but other people might have penetration.

What champion were you using? What teammates did you have? Were they present during this?

> [{quoted}](name=Shrewd,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=8bhZr0Ab,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-06-17T23:40:20.340+0000)
>
> Basic arithmetic suggests that you haven't accounted for 100% of the damage. 

New to the internet Shrewd?

I have added up all the damage it shows on the death recap, i cant add up any damage that doesnt show on the recap because according to the recap it didn't happen.

secondly as seen on the death recap the only ability that had any effect was yasuo's ult which means i didn't actually get knocked up by anything, (or else it would show on the death recap) his ult obviously just hit me without knock ups, but because it was the only ability that hit me banshees should block it.

thirdly none of the three damage sources have penetration items as seen in items slots in the death recap, and i doubt very much that a few penetration runes would make the difference between 547 and 2128 damage.

i was using Yasuo as well and i cant remember my teammates, yea they were present, we were all fleeing because we wanted to avoid a fight but i got grabbed by thresh (but obviously i didn't get grabbed because if i did it would show in the death recap) and they did see me die.
Please tell me how to get knocked up without losing BV passive.
Yas's crit failed to calculate is all.
